description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Falafel Wraps With Chilli & Lime Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Falafel wrap,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Picnic,Tomato,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Falafel Wraps With Chilli & Lime Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup gluten-free Red Kellys sweet chilli lime dressing
1 pkt Woolworths Free From Gluten corn tortillas

recipeInstructions.text: Make gluten-free falafel according to packet instructions. Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Cook falafels, turning regularly, for 8 minutes or until dark golden on all sides. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels to drain.
To make the tabouli, combine all ingredients in a bowl and season.
Serve falafels with diced tomato, sliced red onion, tabouli, gluten-free dressing, salad leaves and gluten-free wraps.
